name: Push Push Cat
description:
Available on # PUSH AND SLIDE CATS TO RESCUE!

Push the blocks and make a way to save the cute cats who have lost their homes!!

`Push Push Cat` is a classic sliding puzzle game that anyone can easily learn and enjoy.
You can adopt cute homeless cats in various themes and customize them and shoot selfies.

You can meet many famous cats from around the world to empathize and heal.
Cats who are more affectionate than their stomachs, please come and pet them now!

# HOW TO PLAY
  • Blocks can only be pushed up and down or left and right depending on the direction in which they are placed.
  • Clear the stage by pushing the homeless cat to rescue!
  • Rescue the cat and build up your affinity for adoption.
  • The fewer blocks you move, the faster you get to know the cat
  • You can buy costumes with coins and decorate your cats!
  • The higher your affinity, the more gifts you bring when you go out sometimes!
  • When you encounter a puzzle that is difficult to solve? There're Hint items for you
  • Three times a day! Daily puzzle gives more rewards.
  • In the travel theme pack, there are also special cats from each country! Awesome!
# FEATURES
  • NO WIFI? NO PROBLEM! Enjoy `Push Push Cat` anytime, anywhere!
  • FREE TO PLAY & Suitable for all ages.
  • NO penalties & time limits; You can enjoy `Push Push Cat` at your own pace!
  • Show off in the world rankings with the records you have achieved.
# NOTES
  • `Push Push Cat` supports mobile phones & tablet PCs.
  • `Push Push Cat` contains ads varying from banners, interstitials, video to house ads.
  • `Push Push Cat` is free to play, however, you may purchase Ad-Free item.

Need Help? Have Questions?
We value your feedback! Please contact us at games@unit5soft.com

This game supports 'English', '한국어', '日本語', '中文简体', '中文繁體', 'Deutsch', 'français', 'Español', 'Italian', 'Portuguese', 'Indonesian', 'Русский', 'Turkish', 'ไทย', 'Tiếng Việt'.
